content: i use my crochet exercise armband every day to hold my phone when i go for a walk it s also great for running and cycling as well there is an optional small pocket to hold a house key or two if you like make it as a gift for the exercise junkie in your life if not you and the best thing is that you can personalise it with stripes checks embroidery or colors to reflect personal preferences **basic sewing skills are essential to complete this project the finishing seams must be sewn by a sewing machine ** the stretchy crochet armband is secured with velcro hook and loop fastener and a waste plastic screen is sewn in to make it waterproof as well the armband is crocheted in single_crochet only with a few slip stitches but the unique design makes it very functional and look just like the exercise armbands you can purchase it s a modern and streamlined look and i spent a lot of time making a detailed video which takes you through the pattern step by step in addition to the written pattern which has many photos this pattern is written in us crochet terms the pattern includes the following - link to a full video for each section in pattern - written instructions with step by step colour photos **skill level** intermediate crocheter only single_crochet is used however finishing may require some experience but adventurous upper beginners can give it a try the pattern has been tech edited and tested **yarn** hobbii acacia sport weight or alize diva stretch bikini yarn held double or himalaya celinda stretch yarn held double or you can try any 50/50 cotton /acrylic sport weight yarn **notions** scissors tapestry needle for yarn 6 x 4 inch / 16 cm x 11 cm piece of clear waste plastic sewing cotton in matching color and sewing needle or sewing machine velcro preferably heavy duty 40 cm / 16 inches **yardage** 125 - 130m / 136 - 142 yards 1 ball of any of the yarns mentioned above is sufficient **stitches used** only single_crochet and slip stitches *follow me on** https //crochetlovemelbourne com/links/ instagram pinterest youtube **sign up** to my newsletter for new patterns discounts and free pattern alerts **ask for help** anytime from me to support my patterns through email or dms
